If it was correct it wouldn’t give errors that make no sense. Good luck though with your other work

this

and also it will work if you put it in the right spot :rolleyes:

item.title: Loyality Titles Help. *Eh I gave up*
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

Yea, that would pose a problem,

Ok, place the public void right below “public class client”

Should be something like this:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
        public void models() {
**REST OF CODE**
}

I dont really know if its the server side or the client side, but, even if you are someone new, you should understand.

Read full topic
item.source: Loyality Titles Help. *Eh I gave up*

item.title: Loyality Titles Help. *Eh I gave up*
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

Hey guys I was following this guide and I got these errors:

Java\client.java:177: error: illegal start of expression public void models() { ^ Java\client.java:177: error: illegal start of expression public void models() { ^ Java\client.java:177: error: ';' expected public void models() { ^ Java\client.java:187: error: illegal start of expression public byte[] getModel(int Index) { ^ Java\client.java:187: error: ';' expected public byte[] getModel(int Index) { ^ Java\client.java:187: error: ';' expected public byte[] getModel(int Index) { ^ Java\client.java:202: error: illegal start of expression private void stopMidi() { ^ Java\client.java:202: error: illegal start of expression private void stopMidi() { ^ Java\client.java:202: error: ';' expected private void stopMidi() { ^ Java\client.java:207: error: illegal start of expression private boolean menuHasAddFriend(int j) { ^ Java\client.java:207: error: ';' expected private boolean menuHasAddFriend(int j) { ^ Java\client.java:207: error: ';' expected private boolean menuHasAddFriend(int j) { ^ Java\client.java:216: error: illegal start of expression public void drawChannelButtons() { ^ Java\client.java:216: error: illegal start of expression public void drawChannelButtons() { ^ Java\client.java:216: error: ';' expected public void drawChannelButtons() { ^ Java\client.java:338: error: illegal start of expression private void drawChatArea() { ^ Java\client.java:338: error: illegal start of expression private void drawChatArea() { ^ Java\client.java:338: error: ';' expected private void drawChatArea() { ^ Java\client.java:825: error: illegal start of expression public void init() { ^ Java\client.java:825: error: illegal start of expression public void init() { ^ Java\client.java:825: error: ';' expected public void init() { ^ Java\client.java:840: error: illegal start of expression public void drawTabHover() { ^ Java\client.java:840: error: illegal start of expression public void drawTabHover() { ^ Java\client.java:840: error: ';' expected public void drawTabHover() { ^ Java\client.java:875: error: illegal start of expression public void startRunnable(Runnable runnable, int i) { ^ Java\client.java:875: error: illegal start of expression public void startRunnable(Runnable runnable, int i) { ^ Java\client.java:875: error: ';' expected public void startRunnable(Runnable runnable, int i) { ^ Java\client.java:875: error: <identifier> expected public void startRunnable(Runnable runnable, int i) { ^ Java\client.java:875: error: not a statement public void startRunnable(Runnable runnable, int i) { ^ Java\client.java:875: error: ';' expected public void startRunnable(Runnable runnable, int i) { ^ Java\client.java:886: error: illegal start of expression public Socket openSocket(int port) throws IOException { ^ Java\client.java:886: error: ';' expected public Socket openSocket(int port) throws IOException { ^ Java\client.java:886: error: ';' expected public Socket openSocket(int port) throws IOException { ^ Java\client.java:886: error: not a statement public Socket openSocket(int port) throws IOException { ^ Java\client.java:886: error: ';' expected public Socket openSocket(int port) throws IOException { ^ Java\client.java:890: error: illegal start of expression private void processMenuClick() { ^ Java\client.java:890: error: illegal start of expression private void processMenuClick() { ^ Java\client.java:890: error: ';' expected private void processMenuClick() { ^ Java\client.java:996: error: illegal start of expression public static int totalRead = 0; ^ Java\client.java:996: error: illegal start of expression public static int totalRead = 0; ^ Java\client.java:996: error: ';' expected public static int totalRead = 0; ^ Java\client.java:998: error: illegal start of expression public static String getFileNameWithoutExtension(String fileName) { ^ Java\client.java:998: error: illegal start of expression public static String getFileNameWithoutExtension(String fileName) { ^ Java\client.java:998: error: ';' expected public static String getFileNameWithoutExtension(String fileName) { ^ Java\client.java:998: error: ')' expected public static String getFileNameWithoutExtension(String fileName) { ^ Java\client.java:998: error: illegal start of expression public static String getFileNameWithoutExtension(String fileName) { ^ Java\client.java:998: error: ';' expected public static String getFileNameWithoutExtension(String fileName) { ^ 47 errors Press any key to continue . . .
Any help is GREATLY appreciated, thank you.
